column2: While no formal system of taxation truly exists in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], the reigning [Root.GetTitle] is permitted to levy the wealth of [Root.GetHersHis] vassals once every year. However, it is ultimately up to each vassal whether or not to honour the request.
You are preparing to request funds from the many subjects of your realm. You can only do this once per year.

TO: [Root.GetTitledName]
FROM: [From.GetTitledName]
RE: A Levy Tax
We, in accordance with established law and oath in our fair realm of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], request a contribution to the treasury for the next year.
